original_title: Lots & Lots of TRAINS, Vol 2 - Thunder on the Tracks!
overview: You'll see so many trains we can hardly count them all - winding through mountains, climbing steep grades, gliding over trestles, hauling, pulling, loading, and much, much more! Hear the blast of steam whistles, thrill to the blaring of diesel horns, and watch in awe as these titans of the tracks thunder on by. Feel the heat, smell the smoke, and cover your ears because our cameras crews take you up-close and right to where all the action is! It's an unforgettable rail experience you'll watch again and again.
title: Lots & Lots of TRAINS, Vol 2 - Thunder on the Tracks!
